name: Tides of Trade
description:
Buy and sell your way to riches as you sail the seas in this calm little time-waster!

Tides of Trade is a short to complete but never ending game available for free.

Features

  • Prices are dynamically calculated depending on a trader's stock.
  • Traders use up items at different rates, and produce their own items.
  • Travelling consumes supplies, so you must make sure not to run out.
  • If the player loses, their progress is reset but the world stays the same.
  • Random encounters can help or hinder you as you sail.
  • Aim to collect enough gold to pay off your debts!

How To Play

  • Point and click to move.
  • Press E to open your inventory, and Q to open the travel menu.
  • Click and type to buy and sell.
  • Press Escape to open the menu.

This is my first real game, and as such any feedback/bug reports/advice is greatly appreciated, feel free to ask anything you want in the comments.
